data.title: Nordgreen Copenhagen
data.meta_description: Nordgreen Copenhagen | 2,685 followers on LinkedIn. Scandinavian Lifestyle Watches | Nordgreen Copenhagen - Scandinavian Lifestyle Watches. B-Corp Certified.
data.text:
We at Nordgreen are excited to venture into the South Korean market, thanks to our strategic collaboration with the renowned fashion platform, Tenitz. 🌟 This expansion offers a unique and promising opportunity for our B2B business. We recognize the importance of cultural understanding and economic insight to achieve success in this dynamic market. 🤝 Partnering with Tenitz allows us to navigate South Korea’s emphasis on authenticity. Their expertise in launching concept-driven brands will help us reach the MZ generation. 📈 With Tenitz as our local distributor, we will gain valuable market insights, streamline logistics, reduce costs and risks, and boost brand visibility. 👗 We are honored to have Hong Sun-pyo, a legend in the South Korean fashion industry, on board. His industry expertise and influence will be invaluable in driving our success. 🌟 Additionally, we are excited to collaborate with Korean celebrities and influencers under Tenitz’s partnership, enhancing our brand appeal and connecting with a broader audience. 🏬 As part of our expansion strategy, we plan to leverage physical pop-up stores. These will enable direct customer interaction and strengthen our offline presence in the South Korean market.Stay tuned for more updates as we embark on this exciting journey! #Nordgreen #Expansion #SouthKorea #Tenitz #Partnership #B2B #Fashion #MarketEntry #Sustainability #Innovation

We're excited to share that Harnaaz Sandhu, former Miss Universe, has joined us as our new Brand Ambassador in India! 🇮🇳 This incredible partnership was made possible with the support of our new distributor Riveram India, highlighting the importance of having a strong influence in the local market. Harnaaz's elegance and dedication align perfectly with our brand values, and this collaboration marks a significant milestone for us. It enhances our brand's visibility and demonstrates our dedication to engaging with our global audience. ☘️ Together, we aim to inspire our community with products and experiences that resonate deeply with their values and aspirations. 🚀 You can read the full article here: https://lnkd.in/dXVf-TMk

New Adventure for Nordgreen! 🌟🌱 Stepping into the fashion scene with style and sophistication! 🚀 We are thrilled to introduce our new venture into the fashion world with a unique collaboration with the prestigious Swedish cashmere brand, DAVIDA. Through our digital partnership, we're curating a platform where like-minded individuals, who appreciate minimalist refinement and mindful consumption, can discover products that resonate with their principles. Anchored in the timeless elegance of Scandinavian design, our collaboration embodies longevity, enduring grace, and a dedication to our environment.

🌟 Exciting News Alert! 🌟 At Nordgreen, innovation is our middle name, and we're thrilled to showcase our latest endeavour: the "Touch and Feel" concept, now live at Magasin Du Nord, Copenhagen! Gone are the days of watches being mere distant luxuries behind glass. With our Touch and Feel display, we're bringing our products closer to you, offering a tactile experience like never before. We believe that beautiful objects shouldn't be confined behind glass walls – their functionality should be experienced firsthand and enjoyed to the fullest. We cordially invite you to visit Magasin Du Nord and immerse yourself in this innovative concept. Come touch, feel, and experience our products firsthand. See you there! #Nordgreen #Innovation #TouchAndFeel #MagasinDuNord #Copenhagen #ExperienceTheDifference
